name: Calabozo Basico
description:
Explore a winding, twisting labyrinth, fighting both creepy and cute monsters, forging ever deeper in search of... what? Fame? Riches? Power?

Source Code: https://github.com/K1aymore/2023-Spring-Jam-Dungeon

Soundtrack:

https://abstractionmusic.bandcamp.com/track/deep-blue From the album Three Red Hearts by Abstraction

All other audio tracks and sound: https://maou.audio
